name: 何文章
objective: 教導學生熟悉光纖通訊技術與趨勢, 光電主動元件及被動元件之原理與特性, 及光纖通訊系統概念。課程內容包括：1.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications, 2.Principles of Optics, 3.Characteristics of Optical Fibers, 4.Fiber Connectors and Splices, 5.Optical Sources and Transmitters, 6.Optical Detectors and Receivers, 7.Fiber-Optic Devices, 8.Optical Signals and Networks, 9.Fiber-Optic Communications Systems, 10.Fiber-Optic Tests and Measurements。
schedule:
1.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications:第一週,
2.Principles of Optics:第二週,
3.Characteristics of Optical Fibers:第二週--第四週,
4.Fiber Connectors and Splices:第五週-- 第六週,
5.Optical Sources and Transmitters:第七週--第八週,
期中考 :第九週,
6.Optical Detectors and Receivers:第十週--第十一週,
7.Fiber-Optic Devices,
8.Optical Signals and Networks:第十二週--第十三週,
9.Fiber-Optic Communications Systems:第十四週--第十五週,
10.Fiber-Optic Tests and Measurements:第十六週,
期末考與口頭報告 :第十六週--第十八週
